explanation: [0-0] A young woman with long hair wearing a black top is standing in the kitchen. In front of her is a yellow countertop with a gas stove. She holds a ladle in one hand, dipping it into a pot on the stove. Various seasonings are placed on the windowsill.

[0-4] The woman scoops up some white soup from the pot with the ladle and pours it onto her hand. Then, she lowers her head, sticks out her tongue to taste it, and shakes her head happily, indicating that it tastes good. Afterward, she scoops up some more soup with the ladle, holds it in her right hand, and turns to the left.

[4-12] The woman walks through a yellow doorway into a white room. She can be seen wearing a pair of colorful striped pants. A man in a blue shirt is sitting on the sofa, looking at his phone. The woman approaches the man, and he looks up. She gestures for him to taste the soup. The man extends his hand, and she pours some soup into it, accidentally spilling some onto his shirt. The man quickly lowers his head to drink the soup, then turns to look at the woman with a puzzled expression, before looking down at the soup in his hand again. The woman sadly turns and walks to the right. The man continues looking at his phone.
